document.full_text: drew hill arrived in the n.f.l. as an unheralded 12th-round draft pick and became a pro bowl receiver in 1988 and 1990.
document.title: drew hill, receiver for run-and-shoot oilers, dies at 54
lines_and_colors: drew hill arrived in the n.f.l. as an unheralded 12th-round draft pick and became a pro bowl receiver in 1988 and 1990.
